list.abs: meanwhile , Study says that " cautious food " , contains fruits and vegetables , can reduce the risk of rate. the research will release in the magazine of people circulation on Dec . 21th .同时，研究表明，富含水果和蔬菜的“谨慎饮食”则能够降低患心脏病的风险。该研究报告在本月21日的《人体循环》杂志上发表。
